author: Morgan Winsor
title: Coronavirus live updates: US Open tennis complex to house temporary hospital
description: A pandemic of the novel coronavirus has infected over three-quarters of a million people around the world.
content:
A pandemic of the novel coronavirus has infected over three-quarters of a million people around the world.
The new respiratory virus, which causes an illness known officially as COVID-19, has rapidly spread to every continent except Antarctica since first em… [+3086 chars]
